What are the treatments for fragile X syndrome ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of fragile X syndrome:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: FMR1-Related Disorders  - GeneFacts: Fragile X Syndrome: Diagnosis  - GeneFacts: Fragile X Syndrome: Management  - Genetic Testing Registry: Fragile X syndrome  - MedlinePlus Encyclopedia: Fragile X syndrome   These resources
